turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help yOU?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order for pizza from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and how many toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, on the first one I'd like just pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the second one, I'd like pepperoni and sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And on the third I would like tomatoes and onions, please. And I can have all three with thick crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small pizzas, one pepperoni, one pepperoni and sausage, and one tomatoe and onions all with thick crust is what I have. is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total is $36.99 and it will be ready in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll send you a text reciept shortly. Have a good night.
